And so he did! Soulstice Omega throws a silent party because Squawktalk fin=
ally bought the farm, and also hopes that Annie Wilkes doesn't make him bri=
ng him back to life...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: LurkerAbyss=
 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 9:14 PM
  Sub=
ject: Re: More Slaughter!


  ::Slaughter::
   
      Slaughter grinned an =
evil grin as Squawktalk's voice would never be heard again.  Mech fluid, sl=
ime and saliva dripped and sprayed from Slaughter's mouth.  Slaughter final=
ly decided to wolf down the rest of Squawktalk.
    ----- Original Message =
----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent:=
 Friday, June 08, 2001 7:59 PM
    Subject: Re: More Slaughter!


    Squaw=
ktalk: I'll never shut up! I know everyth---

    Slaughter bites of Squawk=
talk's head and ends the chattering. There were probably bots cheering.

  =
  Shokaract: Oh, that can't be good, can it?

    Shokaract stumbled over i=
nto a wall and looks at the multiple images of Slaughter killing Squawktalk=
...

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: LurkerAbyss 
      To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 7:57 PM
      Su=
bject: Re: More Slaughter!


      ::Slaughter::
       
          Slaughte=
r enjoyed the taste of a chunk of Squawktalk.
       
          "Shutup, yo=
u loud-mouthed BIRD-BRAIN!!!!"  Slaughter yelled.
       
          Slaught=
er then tried to bite Squawktalk's head right off, or at least his beak.
  =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice Omega 
        =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 7:45 PM
   =
     Subject: Re: More Slaughter!


        He does.

        Squawktalk: H=
ey! Put that back, fatty! I'll sue ya for every penny ya got!...

         =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: LurkerAbyss 
          To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 7:10 PM
      =
    Subject: Re: More Slaughter!


          ::Slaughter::
           
    =
          Slaughter tightened his grip on Squawktalk, then quickly tried to=
 take a bite out of Squawktalk.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
           From: Soulstice Omega 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
           Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 5:10 PM
            Subject: Re: Mor=
e Slaughter!


            Squawktalk: Heyheyheyheyhey! You don't do this I=
 will sue you know the danger of getting sued you always lose!

           =
 Squawktalk is grabbed...

              ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
          From: LurkerAbyss 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    =
          Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 3:32 PM
              Subject: More S=
laughter!


              ::Slaughter::
               
                  S=
laughter's hunger was slowly going away, thanks to Shokaract's beast mode l=
egs.  
               
                  "I'm bored of you!!  Slaughter sha=
ll eat the BIRD!!!!" Slaughter yelled.
               
                  Sl=
aughter spun around on his heel, slime and saliva from his body flying from=
 his body, then he looked at Squawktalk.
               
                  =
 "I intend on finishing what I START!!!!!" Slaughter shouted again.
       =
        
                   He lunged at Squawktalk, trying to grab him wit=
h one of his pincirs and shove Squawktalk into his mouth to munch on.
